title: AIIMS Bathinda Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for Project Technical Support I Posts
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences Bathinda (AIIMS Bathinda) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Project Technical Support I Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, ITI, and Diploma can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Bathinda Recruitment 2026 . Here we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the...
